announcements.title: Welcome to VO Tracker
announcements.detail:
Welcome to VOTracker! This is an app made by Voice Actors FOR Voice Actors. NO Longer will you forget that producer/director/engineer/random person you met at your sessions name. :) .

• Tip: You can now Track your auditions too! (enable in settings)
• Thank you for being here
• Tell your friends!!

announcements.title: VO Meetup - Los Angeles!
announcements.detail:
Join us this Saturday at 2pm for a casual voice actor meetup. Network, share tips, and grab some coffee with fellow VO professionals!Coffee, vibes, and VO talk — bring a friend if you want.

• Casual networking
• Share tips + resources
• Meet local VO folks

announcements.title: New: Audition Tracking!
announcements.message: VO Tracker now can track your auditions too!
announcements.detail: VO Tracker now can track your auditions! To enable this feature, head to Settings -> Track auditions to start logging your submissions!

footerMessage: Resources updated monthly. Have a suggestion? Let us know!
